at.ac.tuwien.ims.towardsthelight.level

Class Level

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.ac.tuwien.ims.towardsthelight.level.Level

  • public class Level
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds the loaded level image (bitmap) which is intended to be drawn, a LevelInfo object (levelInfo) and an array of collectables (collectables) which are read from the collision image (LevelInfo.collisionResource).
    Author:
    Thomas Koch

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static byte BACKGROUND 
      android.graphics.Bitmap bitmap
      The loaded level image which is displayed.
      java.util.ArrayList<Collectable> collectables
      Contains collectables ordered by their position within the level ascending.
      private byte[] collisionData
      Contains the data of the parsed (collision image).
      LevelInfo levelInfo 
      static byte OBSTACLE

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Level(android.content.Context context, LevelInfo levelInfo)

    • Field Detail

      • BACKGROUND

        public static final byte BACKGROUND
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • OBSTACLE

        public static final byte OBSTACLE
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • levelInfo

        public LevelInfo levelInfo

      • bitmap

        public android.graphics.Bitmap bitmap
        The loaded level image which is displayed. (LevelInfo.imageResource)

      • collisionData

        private byte[] collisionData
        Contains the data of the parsed (collision image). For each white pixel the array contains the value of OBSTACLE, for each black pixel the value of BACKGROUND.

      • collectables

        public java.util.ArrayList<Collectable> collectables
        Contains collectables ordered by their position within the level ascending.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Level

        public Level(android.content.Context context,
             LevelInfo levelInfo)
        Loads the level image and the collision image according to levelInfo and the collectable graphic. Also processes the collision image and fills the collisionData array.
        Parameters:
        context - used to load the level's images.
        levelInfo - general information about the level to be loaded.

    • Method Detail

      • withinBounds

        public boolean withinBounds(int x,
                            int y)
        Checks if x and y are within the image bounds/dimensions.
        Parameters:
        x - the x coordinate
        y - the y coordinate
        Returns:
        true if within the bounds, false otherwise

      • getCollisionData

        public byte getCollisionData(int x,
                             int y)
        Returns the value of the collisionData array at position (x, y) calculated by
        Parameters:
        x - the x position
        y - the y position
        Returns:
        the value of the collisionData array at position (x, y).
